title: tillAnA
sahitya:
dhIm dhIm tadAra dAni dIm dittELAm dhitteLAmta
dhIm dhIm taka tadanita udani taLAm jhOm taka
tillAna tAm tadari tOm tillAna kiTata tAm
tOm tillAna kiTa jham jham tOm tillAna kiTa
tillAna.  bhUpALa.  jhOmpaTa tALA.
tAm tanAm tadani udanita dhrintaka tanOm tamOm tanOm tanOm nAdru dhrutAni 
tOm dhru dhrudAna dAni dAni udani tanita tajhOm tadhAm dhaNam tadIm nAdru 
tillAna tari taddi kiTa taka jham jham taddhi kiTa taka jham jham
dhIm dhIm dhIm tadanita udanita tanadarana kiTa takatOm kiTa takatOm kiTa takatOm kiTa takatOm
nAdari dAni tOm tari dAni tata nidAni dAni taka dhImtaka tOm tillAna yala yalari tOmta nAditaddi kiTa taka tOm
